hero.name: Yosra Houas
hero.description: .NET Developer Analyst specialized in business application development. Over 6 years of experience in design, evolution and maintenance of application solutions
hero.learnMore: Learn more about what I do

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Me
about.p1: .NET Developer Analyst, passionate about developing robust and high-performance business applications. Specialized in C# and SQL Server, I help transform complex business needs into reliable and maintainable software solutions.
about.p2: My approach is based on technical rigor, functional understanding, and attention to detail. I have mainly worked on backend applications with ASP.NET and Entity Framework, as well as on database design and optimization.
about.p3: Curious and autonomous, I also use modern frontend technologies such as React and TypeScript to provide clear and intuitive interfaces, while continuing to deepen my skills on concrete projects.

quality.title: Quality Code
quality.description: Development of robust and maintainable solutions

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Optimization and speed at the heart of every project

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I master to build performant solutions

stockpro.title: StockPro
stockpro.description: Complete web application for stock and inventory management, helping businesses manage products, stocks in multiple warehouses, supplier orders and stock movements. Offers full traceability and real-time stock visibility.

dayplanner.title: DayPlanner
dayplanner.description: Intelligent planning web application allowing to organize your day, manage priorities, visualize tasks and track work time in real time. Built with React + Vite.

portfolio.title: YosraHouas-Portfolio
portfolio.description: Portfolio built with React.js, Vite, Tailwind CSS and JavaScript, this portfolio offers a presentation of my work. In addition, this application also allows users to send me an email directly from the site.

quiz.title: PolyKnowledge-Quiz
quiz.description: A dynamic quiz application with ReactJS, TypeScript, and Styled Components!

gradient.title: Shade-Sweep-Generator
gradient.description: Application helps you generate a linear color gradient that can have up to six colors. Simply choose the desired colors and get the CSS syntax for your project. Vite + React, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit.

pomodoro.title: Pomodoro-Timer
pomodoro.description: Application that relies on the famous Pomodoro technique to promote time management. Developed with React and styled with CSS.

econett.title: Eco_Nett_React
econett.description: Multilingual web application for a cleaning company using JavaScript, React, Bootstrap and Email.js can be an excellent idea to improve the efficiency and accessibility of the company.

covoiturage.title: Covoiturage_BdeB
covoiturage.description: Practical and ecological solution. Whether you are a student, teacher or staff member, our platform will allow you to find carpools for your trips.

quizangular.title: Quiz-app-Angular
quizangular.description: This application is a basic quiz developed with Angular, mainly using TypeScript for logic, SCSS for styles, HTML for structure and a small portion of JavaScript for additional features.

weatherapi.title: weather-app_API
weatherapi.description: The application allows users to check the weather around the world as well as their current location. It also offers the possibility to display the temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius.

platexpress.title: Plat-Express-Angular
platexpress.description: Solution for online food ordering. Designed to simplify your culinary experience, this application stands out for its intuitive and responsive user interface, achieved through the integration of Angular and Bootstrap.

rentcar.title: RentCar-Spring
rentcar.description: Car rental application based on Spring Boot java Hibernate and Thymeleaf. The key features of our application include searching and booking available cars and managing reservations.

techsphere.title: TechSphere
techsphere.description: E-commerce application designed for technology enthusiasts looking for the latest innovations. Created using Servlets, JSP, Bootstrap, CSS, Java and MySQL.

filterify.title: Filterify-Shop-app
filterify.description: This is an e-commerce application with product filters, built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

weatherjson.title: Weather-app-json
weatherjson.description: Access weather forecasts for the next 3, 7 or 14 days. Discover key statistics for the current or upcoming month. Designed with JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap.

comparide.title: Site ComparIDE
comparide.description: Choose the ideal IDE with ease: compare, download and code. Our site, developed with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap, is your development partner.
